summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in block 5, Cove Addition, being the alley between 2nd Avenue West and 3rd Avenue West, from West Boston Street to West Crockett Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7726 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
